explanation: This uses a leading-dot relative import which only works inside a properly installed package. If you try to run this script directly (as __main__), Python will complain that there is no parent package for the relative import.
fix_suggestion:
Change it to an absolute import, for example:
    from shortest_paths import shortest_paths
or run the test as a module of the containing package (python -m package_name.shortest_paths_test) so that the relative import is valid.
